'''Garry Lucken''', also known as '''Army of Trolls''', is a Pixel artist notable for his work on the [[Skin pack]]s in ''Minecraft''. Lucken's work includes the [[City Folk]] and [[Town Folk]] [[skin pack]]s in ''[[Pocket Edition]]'' and has assisted with various Skin packs in [[Legacy Console Edition]].<ref>{{citation|url=https://mojang.com/2015/05/pocket-edition-getting-skins-chicken-jockeys-more/|title=Pocket Edition getting skins, chicken jockeys, more!|website=mojang.com|author=Owen|date=May 26, 2015|quote=Our first two: City Folk and Town Folk have been designed by the talented, kind, and pixellated Army of Trolls.|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150526164021/https://mojang.com/2015/05/pocket-edition-getting-skins-chicken-jockeys-more/}}</ref><ref>{{tweet|4JStudios|258603048392347648|Hearing reports that Skin Pack 3 is available now. Skins in this pack were created by renowned pixel artist "Army of Trolls"!}}</ref>
